title: Analyze Campaign Finance Data
description: A political reporter has a large dataset of campaign contributions and needs to find patterns, such as which industries are donating the most to a candidate.

tasks.description: Import the campaign finance data into a data analysis tool like a spreadsheet or a Python script.
tasks.expected_outcome: The data is successfully loaded and cleaned.

tasks.description: Group the donations by the donor's listed industry.
tasks.expected_outcome: The data is categorized by industry.

tasks.description: Calculate the total donation amount from each industry and identify the top 5.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a ranked list of top donor industries, revealing a significant finding.
